official_title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act by designating a segment of the Wisconsin River for potential addition to the national wild and scenic rivers system.

summary.text: Designates a segment of the Wisconsin River for potential addition to the national wild and scenic rivers system. (Adds 16 U.S.C. 1276(a)(28)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act by designating a segment of the Wisconsin River for potential addition to the national wild and scenic rivers system.
